Name: Battle Imagine - Void Foxen
Description:
Use to activate or advance the Battle Imagine skill of Mutant Foxen - Stunt! Spirit Fox Assault.

Stunt! Spirit Fox Assault
Resonate with the power of Elite Mutant Foxen, leap into the air and swiftly pounce forward for a rapid kill, dealing area Attack Damage, and increases your haste bonus for 20s.
Description$english:
Use to activate or advance the Battle Imagine skill of Mutant Foxen - Stunt! Spirit Fox Assault.

Stunt! Spirit Fox Assault
Resonate with the power of Elite Mutant Foxen, leap into the air and swiftly pounce forward for a rapid kill, dealing area Attack Damage, and increases your haste bonus for 20s.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
